entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain over southern sections. Amount 25 mm over southern sections. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Rain over southern sections early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
